content: Hi all,While iam publishing the ig iam getting the errors.I atach my xml.Please resolve my errors.EKG.structuredefinition.xml Untitled2222.png
have you tried to debug yourself? using the schema for structuredefinition?
@Eric Haas yes.Can you explain how to do it.

looking at your structuredefinition file in xml editor I see a lot of xml encoding error. like stray " and & and <. these will have to be cleaned up. And then you can download the xml schema from the FHIR specification and use that to structurally validate the file using an xml editor like XMLSPY or OXYGEN.
